weekly picks (Dec 4 week 2022)

Posted on December 19, 2022 in 2022dec,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2022 Dec 4th week collection

  1. PhysRevX.12.041031 Phonon Thermal Hall Conductivity from Scattering with Collective Fluctuations (LBalents, PRX) PhysRevB.106.245139 Thermal conductivity and theory of inelastic scattering of phonons by collective fluctuations (PRB) 198 Resolving the Achillesâ Heel of Thermal Hall Conductivity Measurements (Physics)

  2. PhysRevB.106.214425 Topological Nernst effect emerging from real-space gauge field and thermal fluctuations in a magnetic skyrmion lattice (skyrmion, PRB)

  3. PhysRevB.106.214520 Surface state of the interorbital pairing state in the ${\mathrm{Sr}}{2}{\mathrm{RuO}}{4}$ superconductor (surface states, PRB)

  4. PhysRevB.106.224515 Strongly overdoped ${\mathrm{La}}{2\ensuremath{-}x}{\mathrm{Sr}}{x}{\mathrm{CuO}}_{4}$: Evidence for Josephson-coupled grains of strongly correlated superconductor (cuprate, PRB)

  5. PhysRevB.106.235143 Holes and magnetic polarons in a triangular lattice antiferromagnet (triangular, PRB)

  6. PhysRevB.106.235423 Spin Berry curvature of the Haldane model (Haldane, PRB)

  7. PhysRevB.106.235424 Third-order optical nonlinearity of one-dimensional Dirac fermions (Dirac, PRB)

  8. PhysRevB.106.245138 String-like theory of quantum Hall interfaces (droplet, PRB)

  9. PhysRevB.106.245423 Electric field induced tunable half-metallicity in an $A$-type antiferromagnetic bilayer ${\mathrm{LaBr}}_{2}$ (PRB)

  10. PhysRevB.106.L220407 Invisible flat bands on a topological chiral edge (PRB)

  11. PhysRevB.106.235144 Flat bands arising from spin-orbit assisted orbital frustration (PRB)

  12. 2212.09786 Chiral surface superconductivity in half-Heusler semimetals (arXiv)

  13. 2212.10175 Spin-resolved spectroscopy using a quantum dot defined in InAs 2DEG (arXiv)

  14. 2212.09796 Machine learning assisted derivation of effective low energy models for metallic magnets (CDBatista, arXiv)

  15. 2212.10040 Spin Nematics Meet Spin Liquids: Exotic Quantum Phases in the Spin-$1$ Bilinear-Biquadratic Model with Kitaev Interactions (YMotome, arXiv)

  16. PhysRevX.12.041030 Imaging the Ultrafast Coherent Control of a Skyrmion Crystal (skyrmion, PRX) s177 A New Way to Manipulate a Skyrmion Crystal (Physics)

  17. PhysRevLett.129.267701 Tunable Superconducting Coupling of Quantum Dots via Andreev Bound States in Semiconductor-Superconductor Nanowires (PRL)

  18. PhysRevB.106.L241405 One-dimensional topological superconductivity based entirely on phase control (PRB)

  19. PhysRevB.106.L220504 Current-enabled optical conductivity of superconductors (PRB)

  20. PhysRevB.106.214308 Triple hourglass Weyl phonons (PRB)

  21. PhysRevB.106.214309 Hourglass charge-three Weyl phonons (PRB)

  22. PhysRevB.106.224514 Excitation spectra of strongly interacting bosons in the flat-band Lieb lattice (PRB)

  23. PhysRevB.106.245131 Electronic and magnetic properties of the topological semimetal ${\mathrm{SmMg}}{2}{\mathrm{Bi}}{2}$ (PRB)

  24. PhysRevB.106.245305 Effect of external fields in high Chern number quantum anomalous Hall insulators (PRB)

  25. PhysRevB.106.245419 Effects of leakage on the realization of a discrete time crystal in a chain of singlet-triplet qubits (DasSarma, PRB)

  26. PhysRevB.106.L220406 Heat transport of the kagome Heisenberg quantum spin liquid candidate ${\mathrm{YCu}}{3}{(\mathrm{OH})}{6.5}{\mathrm{Br}}_{2.5}$: Localized magnetic excitations and a putative spin gap (PRB)

  27. PhysRevB.106.L241108 Effect of magnetism and phonons on localized carriers in the ferrimagnetic kagome metals ${\text{GdMn}}{6}{\text{Sn}}{6}$ and ${\text{TbMn}}{6}{\text{Sn}}{6}$ (PRB)

  28. PhysRevB.106.214424 Exchange-mediated magnon-phonon scattering in monolayer ${\mathrm{CrI}}_{3}$ (PRB)

  29. PhysRevB.106.235141 Correlated insulating states in carbon nanotubes controlled by magnetic field (Rashba CN, PRB)

  30. PhysRevB.106.235142 Doping effects in high-harmonic generation from correlated systems (PRB)

  31. PhysRevB.106.235313 Coherent spin dynamics of excitons in strained monolayer semiconductors (PRB)

  32. PhysRevB.106.245133 Giant anomalous thermal Hall effect in tilted type-I magnetic Weyl semimetal ${\text{Co}}{3}{\text{Sn}}{2}{\text{S}}_{2}$ (PRB)

  33. PhysRevB.106.245422 Anisotropic electron transport Rashba effects in valleytronics (PRB)

  34. 2212.08767 Electronic Density of States of a $U\left(1\right)$ Quantum Spin Liquid with Spinon Fermi Surface. I. Orbital Magnetic Field Effects (PALee, arXiv)

  35. 2212.08768 Electronic Density of States of a $U\left(1\right)$ Quantum Spin Liquid with Spinon Fermi Surface. II. Zeeman Magnetic Field Effects (PALee, arXiv)

  36. 2212.08778 Zero-field miniature skyrmion crystal and chiral domain state in breathing-kagome antiferromagnets (skyrmion, arXiv)

  37. 2212.08711 Drude weights in one-dimensional systems with a single defect (Watanabe, arXiv)

  38. 2212.08794 Ring-like shaped charge modulations in the t-J model with long-range Coulomb interaction (arXiv)

  39. 2212.08886 Low temperature magnetism of KAgF3 (arXiv)

  40. 2212.09026 One, two, three, $\ldots$ infinity: topological properties of thin films of $\rm Co$-based shandite (YMotome, arXiv)

  41. 2212.09480 Nernst response, viscosity and mobile entropy in vortex liquids (KBehnia, arXiv)

  42. 2212.09566 Phonons of electronic crystals in two-dimensional semiconductor moir\‘e patterns (arXiv)

  43. 2212.09583 Photo-induced charge dynamics in 1$T$-TaS$_2$ (1T-TaS2, arXiv)

  44. 2212.09207 Bound states around impurities in a superconducting bilayer (arXiv)

  45. 2212.09211 Intrinsic superconducting diode effect in disordered systems (arXiv)

  46. 2212.09217 Anomalous Coherence Length of Majorana Zero Modes at Vortices in Superconducting Topological Insulators (arXiv)

  47. 2212.09333 Interpretation of experimental Critical Current Density and Levitation of Superconductors (arXiv)

  48. PhysRevB.106.214420 Acoustic spin transport by superconducting quasiparticles (PRB)

  49. PhysRevB.106.214421 Perfect kagome-lattice antiferromagnets with ${J}_{\mathrm{eff}}=\frac{1}{2}$: The ${\mathrm{Co}}^{2+}$ analogs of the copper minerals volborthite and vesignieite (kagome, PRB)

  50. PhysRevB.106.224105 Forces on dislocations due to strain gradients: Theories and two-dimensional simulations (PRB)

  51. PhysRevB.106.224108 Cation ordering induced two-dimensional vertical ferroelectricity in tungsten and molybdenum trioxides (PRB)

  52. PhysRevB.106.235312 Probing details of spin-orbit coupling through Pauli spin blockade (PRB)

  53. PhysRevB.106.245129 Heavy-fermion representation for twisted bilayer graphene systems (XiDai, PRB)

  54. PhysRevB.106.245130 Non-Abelian bosonization of topological insulators and superconductors (DHLee, PRB)

  55. PhysRevB.106.245132 Fermi arcs from dynamical variational Monte Carlo (AMTremblay, PRB)

  56. PhysRevB.106.L241107 Interplay of ferromagnetism and spin-orbit coupling in ${\mathrm{Sr}}{4}{\mathrm{Ru}}{3}{\mathrm{O}}_{10}$ (PRB)

  57. 2212.08125 Superconductivity by alloying the topological insulator SnBi2Te4 (arXiv)

  58. 2212.08156 Coreless vortices as direct signature of chiral $d$-wave superconductivity (chiral d-wave SC, arXiv)

  59. 2212.08351 Chirality inversion and radius blow-up of a N\‘eel-type skyrmion by a Pearl vortex (skyrmion, arXiv)

  60. 2212.08590 Spin excitations in the Kagome-lattice metallic antiferromagnet Fe${0.89}$Co${0.11}$Sn (kagome, arXiv)
